text:
I want to talk about the apparition of "TikTok", a social media who borned by the name of "musical.ly". It's important for me to talk about that because I think that this social media has changed many things about the communication on internet with new technologies.
Musical.ly was created in 2014 in Paris. At the beggening, there was many "kids" or young adolescents in this platform. There was a place to dance, and editing videos. At this time, using social media (particulary for the oldest adoslescents) was a shame. But, in 2016, the application changed name and was called "TikTok". On the first yeard of tiktok, oldest adolescents and adultes dont pay attention at this plateform and juge it again.
Few years after, appeard the covid-19, the first confinement. Peoples was locked up and boarded, and social medias was the only way to relate with the real world. Many challenges was initiated (with toilet paper for instance...). Tik tok was modify! We can dance on it but not just that, we can record some videos of 15's, 1'min or 3'min on what we want. And here is the change, people's opinions was switched. They begin to record short videos on humuristic things, fashin contents, critical, political contents... New influencers are borned.Tik tok become the new social media the most appreciate by poeples around the world.
 My opinion about this immediate switch of people's trending opinions is that tiktok has changed too fast. Because, like i said, before the covid confinement, there is a lot of kids, or some very young people and today this social media is began for adultes. There is today to much hate, wickedness and harassement for them. TikTok become like Twitter, with a lot of violence.
Moreover, the influence on this plateform is really extreme and dangerous. Influencers are showing perfect life, and make dream people who don't have money to travel, get dressed like them... Many young people belive on all that influencers said and sell, it's a big problem.
